title: B2B opportunity
description: This Data Type is used to capture B2B opportunity properties. They are grouped functioanlly under separate definitions.

xdm:opportunityID.title: Opportunity ID
xdm:opportunityID.description: Parent company for companies that are subsidiaries of a larger company or organization. The parent opportunity must be an existing opportunity in salesforce. You can enter the opportunity name, or select (or optionally, create) the opportunity using the lookup icon.

xdm:accountID.title: Account Id
xdm:accountID.description: Partner opportunitys are opportunitys that a channel manager uses to manage partner organizations, partner users, and activities when using a partner community or partner portal.
